sourcesContent:
// src/blogData.js
export const blogs = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: 'The Art of Layering: Creating Stylish and Functional Outfits',
      description: 'A guide on how to layer outfits in a way that is both functional and stylish...',
      content: 'Layering is both an art and a practical necessity for many climates...',
      quote: 'Layering is the foundation of comfort and style in unpredictable weather...',
      imageUrl: require('./images/first-blog.webp'),
      date: 'August 01, 2023',
      author: 'Marino Themes',
      comments: 2,
      tags: ['Accessories', 'Dress', 'Fashion', 'Spring'],
      previousPost: { id: 2, title: 'How to Build a Versatile Capsule Wardrobe for Men' },
      nextPost: { id: 3, title: 'Essential Wardrobe Staples for Every Stylish Man' }
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: 'A Glimpse into Men’s Fashion Trends: What’s Hot and What’s Not',
      description: 'Explore the latest trends in men’s fashion and discover what’s hot this season...',
      content: 'Men’s fashion trends are constantly evolving...',
      quote: 'Fashion is what you adopt when you don’t know who you are...',
      imageUrl: 'second-blog.webp',
      date: 'August 01, 2023',
      author: 'Marino Themes',
      comments: 0,
      tags: ['Fashion', 'Men', 'Summer'],
      previousPost: { id: 1, title: 'The Art of Layering: Creating Stylish and Functional Outfits' },
      nextPost: { id: 3, title: 'Essential Wardrobe Staples for Every Stylish Man' }
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: 'Fashion Dos and Don’ts Every Woman Should Know',
      description: 'Here are the top fashion dos and don’ts for women to ensure you stay on trend...',
      content: 'Fashion dos and don’ts serve as guidelines...',
      quote: 'Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak...',
      imageUrl: 'third-blog.webp',
      date: 'August 01, 2023',
      author: 'Marino Themes',
      comments: 0,
      tags: ['Women', 'Dress', 'Fashion'],
      previousPost: { id: 2, title: 'A Glimpse into Men’s Fashion Trends: What’s Hot and What’s Not' },
      nextPost: { id: 1, title: 'The Art of Layering: Creating Stylish and Functional Outfits' }
    },
  ];
